column2: "Judahen Ahaz n'afe a otsia duebien no mu na Ela ne ba Hosea hyɛɛ ase dzii Israel do hen wɔ Samaria
column3: na odzii hen mfe akron."

column2: "Na ɔyɛɛ dza omuo wɔ EWURADZE enyi do
column3: naaso nna ɔnntse dɛ Israel ahemfo a wodzii n'enyim kan no."

column2: "Ɔno na Asiriahen Salmanesar fowee baa no do; na Hosea bɛyɛɛ n'akowaa
column3: na ɔdze ayɛyɛdze brɛɛ no."

column2: "Na Asiriahen no hun tsirdo apam wɔ Hosea mu; osiandɛ ɔasoma abɔfo ma wɔakɔ Egypthen So nkyɛn
column3: na ɔammfa ayɛyɛdze annkɛma Asiriahen no
column4: dɛ mbrɛ nkyɛ ɔyɛ no afrenhyia afrenhyia no: dɛm ntsi Asiriahen kyeer no

column2: "Nna Asiriahen no fowee bae bɛfaa asaase no nyinara do
column3: na osii mu kɔr Samaria
column4: na okotuaa no mfe ebiasa."

column2: "Hosea n'afe a otsia akron no mu
column3: na Asiriahen no faa Samaria
column4: na ɔdze Israelmba no kɔr Asiria

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛm
column3: osiandɛ Israelmba ayɛ bɔn etsia EWURADZE hɔn Nyankopɔn a oyii hɔn fii Egypt asaase do
column4: wɔ Egypthen Farao ne nsaadze bae no
column7: "na wɔanantsew amanaman a EWURADZE tuu hɔn fii Israelmba enyim no hɔn ahyɛdze do
column8: na Israel ahemfo dza wɔyɛe no mu."

column2: "Na Israelmba no nam no nsumaa mu yɛɛ ndzɛmba a ɔnntsen tsiaa EWURADZE hɔn Nyankopɔn
column3: na wosisii mbea sorɔnsorɔm wɔ hɔn nkurow nyinara mu maa hɔnho
column4: ofi aweɔmfo abantsentsen do kodu kurow a wɔagye ho ban do."

column2: "Na wosisii edum na Aserim wɔ koko tsentsen biara do
column3: na dua momon biara ase;"

column2: "na hɔ na wɔhyeew eduhuam wɔ mbea sorɔnsorɔm no nyinara do dɛ mbrɛ amanaman a EWURADZE tutuu hɔn fii hɔn enyim no yɛe; na wɔyɛɛ ndzɛmba fun dze yii EWURADZE ebufuw:"
"na wɔsoom abosom a EWURADZE aka hɔn ho asɛm dɛ
column3: Mma hom nnyɛ dɛm adze yi no."

column2: "Naaso EWURADZE nam nkɔnhyɛfo nyinara
column3: na adzehufo nyinara abaw do bɔɔ Israel na Juda kɔkɔ
column4: dɛ
column5: Hom nsan mfi hom akwan bɔn ho
column6: na wondzi me mbransɛm na m'ahyɛdze do
column7: dɛ mbra a mehyɛɛ hom egyanom no nyinara a menam mo nkowaa nkɔnhyɛfo no abaw do mosomae ma wɔdze brɛɛ hom no tse."

column2: "Naaso wɔammpɛ dɛ wotsie
column3: mbom wɔyɛɛ asoɔdzen mbordo
column4: dɛ mbrɛ hɔn egyanom a wɔanngye EWURADZE hɔn Nyankopɔn enndzi no yɛe."

column2: "Na wɔpoow n'ahyɛdze
column3: na n'ahyɛmu a ɔnye hɔn egyanom dzii no
column4: na ne kɔkɔ a ɔbɔɔ hɔn no; na wokedzii egyangyandze ekyir yɛɛ gyan
column5: na wokedzii amanaman a wɔabɔ hɔn ho aprɔw no a EWURADZE ahyɛ hɔn wɔ hɔn ho dɛ mma wɔnnyɛ dɛ hɔn no ekyir."

column2: "Na wɔpoow EWURADZE hɔn Nyankopɔn ne mbrasɛm nyinara
column3: na wɔyɛɛ ehonyi a woegu
column4: mekyerɛ anantwimba ebien

column2: "Na wɔhyeew hɔn mbabanyin na hɔn mbabaa bɔɔ afɔr
column3: na wɔdze adzehwehwɛ na nkaberkyer dzii dwuma
column4: na wɔtɔɔn hɔnho dɛ wɔbɛyɛ dza omuo wɔ EWURADZE enyi do

column2: "Dɛm ntsi EWURADZE no bo fuuw Israel dodoodow
column3: na oyii hɔn fii n'enyi do: obiara annka gyedɛ Juda ebusuakuw nko."

column2: "Na Juda so mpo enndzi EWURADZE hɔn Nyankopɔn ne mbrasɛm do
column3: na wɔnantseew Israel ahyɛdze a wɔyɛe no mu."

column2: "Na EWURADZE poow Israel asefo nyinara
column3: na ohiahiaa hɔn ho
column4: na oyii hɔn hyɛɛ asɛɛfo nsa
column5: kodur dɛ ɔtoow hɔn fii n'enyi do gui."

column2: "Na ɔtseew Israel fii David fi ho; na wɔhyɛɛ Nebat ne ba Jeroboam hen: na Jeroboam twee Israel fii EWURADZE n'ekyir dzi
column3: na ɔmaa wɔyɛɛ bɔn kɛse."

column2: "Na Israelmba nantseew Jeroboam no bɔn a ɔyɛe nyinara mu; na woemmfi ho;"
"kodur dɛ EWURADZE yii Israel fii n'enyi do
column3: dɛ mbrɛ ɔnam no nkowaa nkɔnhyɛfo no nyinara abaw do kae no. Nna wɔfaa Israel fii hɔnankasa hɔn asaase do kɔr Asiria
column4: dze bodu ndɛ da yi."

column2: "Na Asiriahen no kɛfaa nyimpa fii Babilɔn
column3: na Kutha
column4: na Ava
column6: na ɔdze hɔn boguu Samaria nkurow mu hyɛɛ Israelmba no ananmu: na wɔfaa Samaria
column7: na wɔtsenatsenaa no nkurow no mu."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ hɔn hɔ ntsenae n'ahyɛse no mu no
column3: woennsuro EWURADZE: dɛm ntsi EWURADZE somaa ngyata wɔ hɔn mu a wokunkum hɔn mu binom."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi wɔkaa kyerɛɛ Asiriahen no
column3: dɛ
column4: Amanaman a eyiyi na edze hɔn ebogu Samaria nkurow mu yi
column5: wonnyim asaase no do Nyankopɔn n'amambra: dɛm ntsi ɔasoma ngyata wɔ hɔn mu
column9: osiandɛ wonnyim asaase no do Nyankopɔn n'amambra."

column2: "Nna Asiriahen no hyɛɛ dɛ
column3: Hom mfa asɔfo a hom dze hɔn fi hɔ bae no mu baako nkɔ hɔ; na hom mma wɔnkɔ nkɛtsena hɔ
column4: na ɔnkyerɛkyerɛ hɔn asaase no do Nyankopɔn n'amambra."

column2: "Nna asɔfo no a wɔdze hɔn fi Samaria bae no mu baako bae bɛtsenaa Bɛtɛl
column3: na ɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ hɔn mbrɛ wonsi na wɔnsɔr EWURADZE."

column2: "Naaso ɔman biara yeyɛɛ hɔnankasa hɔn enyame
column3: na wɔdze hɔn sisii mbea sorɔnsorɔm do adan a Samariafo yeyɛe no mu
column4: ɔman biara wɔ hɔn nkurow a wɔtse mu no mu."

column2: "Na Babilɔnfo no yɛɛ Sukɔt-benot
column3: na Kutfo no yɛɛ Nergal
column4: na Hamatfo no yɛɛ Ashima
column6: "na Avafo no yɛɛ Nibhaz na Tartak
column7: na Sefarvaimfo hyehyeew hɔn mba wɔ gya mu dze maa Adrammelek na Anammelek

column2: "Nna wɔsɔɔr EWURADZE
column3: na wɔdze hɔn ara hɔn mu bi hyehyɛɛ mbea sorɔnsorɔm do asɔfo a wɔbɔɔ afɔr maa hɔn wɔ mbea sorɔnsorɔm no do adan no mu maa hɔnho."

column2: "Wɔsɔɔr EWURADZE
column3: naaso wɔsoom hɔnankasa hɔn enyame
column4: dɛ mbrɛ amanaman a wɔfaa hɔn fii hɔn mu bae no hɔn amambra tse."

column2: "Ɔdze bodu ndɛ da yi ara wɔyɛ nkan no ndzeyɛɛ no: wɔnnsuro EWURADZE
column3: nkyii so wɔnnyɛ dɛ mbrɛ ahyɛdze
column4: anaa mbra no anaa mbrasɛm a EWURADZE hyɛɛ Jakob a ɔtoo no dzin Israel no ne mba no tse no;"

column2: "hɔn na EWURADZE nye hɔn dzii ahyɛmu
column3: na ɔbraa hɔn
column4: dɛ
column6: nkyii so hom mmbɔ hom mu adze mma hɔn

column2: "mbom EWURADZE a ɔdze tum kɛse na abasa a wɔatserɛw mu yii hom fii Egypt asaase do bae no
column3: ɔno na hom nsuro no
column4: na ɔno na hom mbɔ hom mu adze mma no
column5: na ɔno na hom mbɔ no afɔr:"

column2: "na ahyɛdze na mbra na mbrasɛm a ɔkyerɛwee maa hom no
column3: hom ndwen do nyɛ no daapem; na mma hom nnsɔr enyame fofor:"

column2: "na ahyɛmu a menye hom edzi no mma hom werɛ mmfir; nkyii so mma hom nnsuro enyame fofor:"
"mbom hom EWURADZE Nyankopɔn na hom nsuro no; na ɔno na obeyi hom efi hom atamfo nyinara nsamu."
"Naaso woenntsie
column3: na mbom wɔyɛɛ dɛ mbrɛ nkan no hɔn amambra tse no ara."

column2: "Nna amanaman yi sɔɔr EWURADZE
column3: naaso wɔsoom hɔn ehonyi a woesian no; hɔn mba so
column4: na hɔn mba so mba
column5: dɛ mbrɛ hɔn egyanom yɛe no
column6: dɛmara so na wɔayɛ dze ebodu ndɛ da yi."
